entries.title: Matt Wolfe: AI Tools That Will Change Everything in 2026
entries.summary: Matt Wolfe covers the most impactful AI tools emerging in 2026, including agentic workflows, image generation advances, and productivity stacks.

entries.title: Matt Wolfe: The State of AI Agents — What's Actually Working
entries.summary: Deep dive into which AI agent frameworks and tools are production-ready vs overhyped. Covers OpenClaw, Claude Code, and autonomous workflows.

entries.title: Scientific American: Your Brain Is Glowing, and Scientists Can't Figure Out Why
entries.summary: Dr. Nirosha Murugan's biophoton research featured in Scientific American. External scientists call the work 'potentially groundbreaking.' Covers UPEs in brain tissue and implications for cancer detection.

entries.title: Radiolab (NPR): The Spark of Life — Are We Glowing?
entries.summary: Full Radiolab episode featuring Nirosha Murugan. Covers both brain biophoton research AND cancer diagnosis via UPEs. Excellent for investor credibility.

entries.title: Paper: Biophotonic Markers of Malignancy (BBR 2018, 92% accuracy)
entries.summary: First published validation: 92% accuracy, 100% cancer detection rate. UV/IR wavelength ratio method (420nm, 620nm, 950nm). Foundational HelioFlux science.

entries.title: Paper: UPEs as Non-Invasive Early-Malignancy Detection (Cancers 2020, 90% accuracy)
entries.summary: 90% accuracy across 13 cell lines. 24-hour detection in mouse models. Confirms platform technology potential beyond initial cell line study.

entries.title: Paper: Exploring UPEs as Optical Markers of Brain Activity (iScience/Cell Press 2025)
entries.summary: 20 human subjects. Brain biophotons cross-validated with EEG. Most recent published research. Cell Press credibility. Directly supports human application of HelioFlux tech.

entries.title: YC Lightcone: The AI Agent Economy Is Here
entries.summary: YC partners (Garry Tan, Harj Taggar, Jared Friedman) discuss the agent economy. OpenClaw explicitly named. Key insight: 'Make something agents want' as new YC motto. Non-technical CEOs automating businesses with OpenClaw. Agents as economic actors. Relevant: Kelly is a live case study for this episode.
